summary: A letter from UBS Group AG to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, transmitting financial records in response to a grand jury subpoena dated June 29, 2020, related to Ghislaine Maxwell. The letter includes a password-protected WinZip file containing account opening documents and statements, with a request for confidentiality.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The grand jury subpoena and the document production are related to her case.

persons.name: Jezebel Diaz
persons.role: UBS Group AG Legal-SLG Group representative
persons.context: The author of the letter transmitting the subpoenaed documents to the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued to UBS
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued to UBS Financial Services Inc., requesting information and documentation related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: UBS Submits Documents to SDNY
events.description: UBS Group AG, via Jezebel Diaz, submitted a password-protected WinZip file containing account records and statements to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in response to the grand jury subpoena.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
1285 Avenue of the Americas - 12th Floor, New York, NY 10019
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to UBS Financial Services Inc. on June 29, 2020, seeking information related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
UBS responded on July 10, 2020, by providing account opening documents and account statements in a password-protected WinZip file.
The letter requests that the documents be kept confidential and not disclosed to third parties outside the legal proceeding.
The correspondence indicates an active financial investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
UBS Financial Services Inc. is identified as a subsidiary of UBS AG.
